RapidFit:
////////////////////////////////////////// // Reference file for fit to data //////////////////////////////////////////
//================================================ // Formal Parameters to be fitted or fixed
//........................................ // Parameters which can be fixed for Scans
//Fractions
SignalFractionUBU 0.68 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT 0.60 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU 0.73 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT 0.63 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
// Mass
alphaM_pr // exponent 0.0013 Free Unitless
f_sig_m1 // Fraction of first Gaussian 0.83 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1 // Gaussian width in MeV 6.5 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21 2.14 1.0 10.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs 5365.5 Free MeV/c^{2}
// LL lifetimes
f_LL1 // Fraction of first exponential 0.9921 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1 // First exponent 0.145 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2 //Second exponent 0.994 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
f_LL1_B 1.0 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_B 0.370 0.01 1. Free Unitless
tau_LL2_B 0.0 0.00 0.0 Fixed Unitless
//.......................................... // Parameters which cant be fixed for scans
// True Physics Parameters for signal
gamma 0.662 0.0 10.0 Free ps^{-1}
deltaGamma 0.10 Free ps^{-1}
Aperp_sq 0.27 0. 1. Free Unitless
Azero_sq 0.49 Free 0. 1. Unitless
As_sq 0.00 0. 1. Free Unitless
delta_para 3.29 6.3 -6.3 Free Unitless
delta_perp 2.7 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
delta_zero 0.0 -3.3 3.3 Fixed Unitless
delta_s 3.0 -6.3 6.3 Free Unitless
deltaM 17.63 Free ps-1
Phi_s 0.17 Free Unitless
//.................................. // Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolutionScale 1.0 Free unitless
timeResolution1 0.0434 Fixed ps
timeResolution2 0.0853 Fixed ps
timeResolution3 0.513 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction 0.165 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction 0.0017 Fixed unitless
timeOffset //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
// Angular acceptance factors
angAccI1 0.9795 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI2 1.0304 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI3 1.0307 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI4 0.0004 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI5 0.0012 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI6 -0.0005 // Fixed Unitless
angAccI7 0.9941 Fixed Unitless
angAccI8 -0.0031 Fixed Unitless
angAccI9 0.0005 Fixed Unitless
angAccI10 -0.0024 Fixed Unitless
// Mistag parameters
// Fixed Mistag for MP
mistag 0.5 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1 1.037 Free
mistagP0 0.384 Free
mistagSetPoint 0.379 Fixed
//............................................ // Background model
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2 0.00 Fixed Unitless
//start of +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //2010 additions
// 2010 Mass model
// Signal Mass parameters for double Gaussian mass model
f_sig_m1_2010 // Fraction of first Gaussian 0.83 0.0 1.00001 Fixed Unitless
sigma_m1_2010 // Gaussian width in MeV 6.5 0.0 100.0 Free MeV/c^{2}
ratio_21_2010 2.14 1.0 10.0 Fixed MeV/c^{2}
m_Bs_2010 5365.5 Free MeV/c^{2}
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBT_2010 0.78 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionUBU_2010 0.72 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBT_2010 0.78 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//Fraction of signal in total sample
SignalFractionBU_2010 0.72 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
//............................................ // 2010 Background model
// Long lived lifetime components for double exponential model
f_LL1_2010 // Fraction of first exponential 0.989 0.0 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL1_2010 // First exponent 0.236 0.01 0.5 Free Unitless
tau_LL2_2010 //Second exponent 1.5 0.05 3.0 Free Unitless
f_LL1_II_2010 // Fraction of first exponential 1.0 0.0 1.0 Fixed Unitless
tau_LL1_II_2010 // First exponent 0.236 0.01 1.0 Free Unitless
tau_LL2_II_2010 //Second exponent 1.5 0.05 3.0 Fixed Unitless
//Exponential background mass model
alphaM_pr_2010 // exponent 0.00140 Fixed Unitless
//Long lived time resolution components
timeResLL1Frac_2010 1.0 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL1_2010 0.00 Fixed Unitless
sigma_LL2_2010 0.00 Fixed Unitless
// 2010 mistag model
// Fixed Mistag for MP
mistag_2010 0.5 Fixed
// Mistag calibration
mistagP1_2010 1.0 Free
mistagP0_2010 0.338 Free
mistagSetPoint_2010 0.338 Fixed
// 2010 Detector Parameters
//Signal PDF time resolution parameters for double gaussian model.
timeResolution1_2010 0.0337 Fixed ps
timeResolution2_2010 0.0646 Fixed ps
timeResolution3_2010 0.180 Fixed ps
timeResolution2Fraction_2010 0.456 Fixed unitless
timeResolution3Fraction_2010 0.017 Fixed unitless
timeOffset_2010 //Leave at Zero, this is not used anywhere yet. 0.000 Fixed ps
//End of 2010 additions +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
//========================================== // Specify which minimiser to use.
Minuit 100000 0.0001 1
NegativeLogLikelihood #Petes
1
//========================================== // Specify the fit
//................................... // This applies a constraint on deltaM
deltaM 17.63 0.11
timeResolutionScale 1.0 0.02
// This applies a constraint on mistag scale
mistagP1 1.037 0.081
mistagP0 0.384 0.010
mistagP1_2010 1.01 0.12
mistagP0_2010 0.338 0.012
// .................... // Attempt to constrain LLscan on the amplitudes
ATOTAL 1.0 0.00001
// .................... // Attempt to constrain GH and GL positive
GLandGH 0.0 0.00001
//======================================== // UN-BIASED UN-TAGGED events
SignalFractionUBU
Bs2JpsiPhi_SignalAlt_MP_v3 UseTimeAcceptance:True TimeAcceptanceType:Upper tag:tag_os
BsMass
LongLivedBkg_3Dangular AngularDistributionHistogram:2011-JPsiPhi-backgroundangles-tight.root
Bs2JpsiPhiMassBkg
